questions.question: Who was the first President of the United States?

gpt3.5.answer: George Washington, who served as the first President from 1789 to 1797

claude.answer: George Washington was the first President of the United States

questions.question: What is the chemical symbol for gold?

claude.answer: The chemical symbol for gold is Au, derived from the Latin word 'aurum'

questions.question: Which is the largest ocean on Earth?

claude.answer: The Atlantic Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth

questions.question: Which actor played Tony Stark in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?

claude.answer: Robert Downey Jr. portrayed Tony Stark/Iron Man in the MCU

questions.question: In which year were the first modern Olympic Games held?

claude.answer: The first modern Olympic Games were held in 1896
